verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praise the Lord! Praise the Lord! Let the earth hear His voice. Praise the Lord! Praise the Lord! Let the people rejoice. Oh come to the Father through Jesus the Son And give Him the glory, great things He has done.{/lang-eng}

verse.lines: {lang-eng}Great things He has shown us, great things He has done. And great our rejoicing in Jesus the Son. But purer and higher and greater will be Our joy and our transport when Jesus we see.{/lang-eng}
